function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with hand hygiene, social distancing, and other preventative measures","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19, overwhelming healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Encourage and educate individuals and communities on the importance of compliance, enforce regulations if necessary","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine for remote healthcare","People":"General population, especially individuals above 60, people with underlying health conditions, and pregnant women","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Failure to disinfect frequently touched surfaces","Impact":"Higher risk of contamination and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough disinfection of surfaces, use of antimicrobial coatings and materials","Technologies":"Antimicrobial UV light, self-cleaning surfaces, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, facility managers","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning companies, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate use and disposal of masks","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission if masks are not used and disposed of properly","Mitigation":"Proper education on mask use and disposal, providing guidance and resources for mask distribution and disposal","Technologies":"Smart masks with built-in sensors for monitoring and disposal reminders, biodegradable masks","People":"General population, especially individuals in crowded areas","Owner":"Health authorities, mask manufacturers, and environmental organizations"}]}
